Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY, DANGEROUS.NO RETURN POLICY
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Porter "stat help"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these.  Upon putting the batteries in (yes they were in correctly) the unit got extremely hot and the batteries (brand new, purchased same day) got extremely hot.  Before I could get the batteries out the unit was smoking.  When I went to return, the Amazon page said the items were not returnable.  So I spent over $70 for nothing.  Do not purchase these our you will be out money too.  Shame on Amazon, Shame on US Patrol.

Reviews.Title: Insert batteries and get smoke and burning plastic smell
Reviews.Author: Stuart G. Helm "Systems Engineer"
Reviews.Content: I plugged it into a USB port and it worked fine.I inserted new batteries and the unit started to smoke and a burning plastic smell came from the unit.I'm returning it for a replacement because it would be a good product if it worked.

Reviews.Title: Works OK for what I need.
Reviews.Author: RED
Reviews.Content: I got mine and it has worked fine so far. The property I am watching is in the country ad isolated. The first time I left it there, it's batteries ran out before I got back to download the pictures. It appeared someone had been around but because the batteries failed, I didn't get any pictures. I have always used a 2GB SD card that to make sure I don't loose any pictures. It would have been nice to have a suggested life of the batteries included in the instructions.

Reviews.Title: Barely ok product
Reviews.Author: Kriste  DeLay
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these, one worked OK the other had some thing wrong with it. After turning it on it smoked and the batteries got hot, ( yes the batteries were inserted correctly) Both units had wires sticking out the circuit board in the Battery compartment that made one of the batteries hard to insert and remove. For the price if they were made or put together right would be a great buy. The one that worked took really clear and nice pictures. But I feel the quality control sucked. Sorry I really wanted to give this item a very positive review.U.S. Patrol JB5472 Photo Patrol Security Camera I really hope I just had bad luck and got the only 2 bad cameras.

Reviews.Title: Unit smoked when batteries inserted
Reviews.Author: Kevin Hall
Reviews.Content: I placed some brand new batteries into unit. Carefully made sure they were in correctly since some people had reported the unit overheating.  I pressed the power button and 4 seconds later smoke was pouring out of the unit!  I got slight burns to my fingers trying to pull the batteries out and they were still hot a minute later.  The only thing that would do this is a direct short through the batteries.  I notice Amazon stopped selling them.  Is this why?

Reviews.Title: Just keeps on taking pictures - no motion detection
Reviews.Author: M. Copeland
Reviews.Content: I so much wanted this to work. I put the batteries in and set the date/time. I then placed it on a table facing my kitchen to test it out. After about 10 minutes, I hooked it up to a computer. There were 290 pictures on it!! Most were of NOTHING. I used a program to quickly step through the pictures and there wasn't even a flicker of difference from one to the next on about 285 of the pictures. There were about 5 that had my wife walking into the kitchen. The shutter speed was so slow the picture was blurry. If I hadn't known who it was, I wouldn't have been able to tell from the picture.There is a display on the back that you use to set the date. Once operating, it displays how many pictures it took along with a battery indicator and the word "Hi". The instructions are ridiculous but I was able to figure out how to set the date/time. What I can't do is alter anything else. Apparently, the sensitivity is so low that it just constantly takes pictures. With a 2GB memory card, I should get about 25,000 pictures based on the instructions. Unfortunately, that's less than 3 days. I want to set this up and let it take the random picture over a matter of weeks. Who has time to go through 24,990 pictures of nothing to find the 10 pictures of that deer eating my tomato plants?Mostly worthless, I'm afraid.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk camera
Reviews.Author: Scientist
Reviews.Content: I put in the batteries and the entire unit heated up to a point that it was difficult to handle. Seems as thought something shorted out the batteries. The unit never turned on and is useless. What a waste of money!!

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Jakwabt
Reviews.Content: Recent purchase off ebay, the unit worked for 1 day, then  quit.  I changed batteries, used an external power source still nothing!  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY  NOT WORTH IT!

Reviews.Title: doesn't work at all
Reviews.Author: Janine L. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Have put several sets of brand new batteries in it and yet the screen won't fully come on so it must be non-functional.

Reviews.Title: Not worth $5.00
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I bought two units. I put in the batteries and the entire unit heated up and started to smoke.  It seems as though something shorted out the batteries. The unit never turned on and both units are useless.  Both units were poorly put together.  Both security cameras appeared to be a very cheap product. I paid over $40.00 for each of them but they are not worth $5.00. What a waste of money!!

Reviews.Title: Return policy not acceptable
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift to my sister.  By the time she got the gift and tried to use it, it had been past the 30 day return policy you have.  So now I have a unit I can do nothing with.  I think the 30 day issue is too short when you are giving a gift as sometimes you buy a gift for a later time.  Wasted the money buying this from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Too Hot to Handle
Reviews.Author: Arthur Weinberg
Reviews.Content: I followed the battery insertion directions and the unit began to smoke.  I tried to remove the batteries, but discovered they were too hot to touch.  I should have read other comments before ordering.  It is not represetative of the quality products offered by Amazon and should be removed from sale.

Reviews.Title: Great so far...i
Reviews.Author: CCRC
Reviews.Content: Had it for a week. Added a $12.00 2 gig  SD card.Good quality pic.  Great value. Going to buy several more if this first one works out.Quality of plastic not too sure of. Not really for wet areas as I thought. Must be kept in dry location.Time will tell!

Reviews.Title: A real piece of crap
Reviews.Author: bm4deals
Reviews.Content: This unit is complete junk and will suck the battery life.  Poor picture quality, poor battery life, unable to know when pictures are being taken or if the thing is even working at all.  DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY

Reviews.Title: Too sensative
Reviews.Author: Dano
Reviews.Content: This works well but its a bit too sensative.  It needs some method to narrow down its range of detection because this was going off from the wind blowing my wife's rose bushes which were nearby but not in the direct path of the area I want to monitor.

Reviews.Title: Trash - No, lower than trash.
Reviews.Author: SactoLawyer
Reviews.Content: The first time I used this camera it kept taking a zillion photos even though nothing was moving all night in my office. (No, the air conditioner/heater was not going at night.) I gave up after a few days.  A year or so later I put it up in another office where thefts were occurring after hourrs.  This camera kept missing the shot of whomever was taking stuff and the shots it did "get" were too blurry to be usefull.  It seems that the motion detection system often detects movement before the subject moves into the photo frame of the camera so it kept taking photos of nothing even while stuff was getting stolen "rght from under it's nose" so to  speak.  The lens has too narrow a field of view to be of much use in most single person offices.  While I did capture some photos of the cleaning lady, etc.  However, the photos were of such long duration that the people in the photos where severly blurred because them were moving when the photo was being taken.  In short, it missed every shot of someone taking something and blurred the rest of the photos.  Definitely NOT a camera to count on - especially in even mildly low light.  Pay more for a GOOD motion detecting camera.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: wneem
Reviews.Content: For the short time I had this product performed well. The only setbacks with this product is that it could it could be removed easily and the angle of the camera just covers so little and setting up date and time could be more user friendly. But on a positive note the pictures are clear. ps. I never got try it out in the night time. In trying to make it more secure, it slipped out my hand and fell to ground and broke. It was only 3 feet from the ground.I guess a tougher exterior would be an improvement

Reviews.Title: Good size and unnoticeable
Reviews.Author: Elsie Quinones
Reviews.Content: Although the instructions said that it did not require any software, my old computer (Vista Home) requied a driver for a digital still camera.  Easy to assemble and move around to desired area(s).

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: harquin
Reviews.Content: Buyer beware this is real junk that worked for the first day then knocked out. I bought 3 and only one took a photo in the first day and that was of me hanging up the darn thing

Reviews.Title: Very Cheaply Made
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: I got this camera about two months ago. When it worked, it took very grainy pictures. To get a clear picture you need to stand still and pose for it. Now it quit working all together and wont take pictures. Changed the batteries, still wont work. Wouldn't recommend, sorry!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good little camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa Herman
Reviews.Content: It looks like an airfreshner but is a camera and it takes alot of pics!!  Great for security indoors or anywhere where it can be kept dry.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: ronny
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to watch my driveway, it takes great pictures of nothing in the driveway, but when a car pulls in it don't take pictures.what a waste.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, but works
Reviews.Author: XiMiX
Reviews.Content: It does what it is described to do, albeit cheaply made.It is a quick security camera. Just put the batteries in and its ready to go. I would not bother setting the clock because it takes too long to do with only 3 buttons to set date and time, plus the setting is lost when the battery cover is open (which has to be done to replace the SD memory card).The battery cover is difficult to close and the battery markings are such that they can be mistakenly put in backwards and cause a short and overheat -- as shown by some reviews. However, the unit does have a power adapter input jack and that can be used instead if you supply your own.It has an internal 16MB memory which can be accessed via USB, but it is dynamic and will be lost when batteries die. So SD card is pretty much required unless an external power supply is used.I would not recommend this product if these issue bother you (which seems to have been the case with all the reviewers).

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: garyra8668
Reviews.Content: the camera works very good. not a real high quailty picture, but, for the price, it is good quality. i put in a set of eveready gold batteries, and they are lasting a long time. i only use it when i am away from home for more than one day. it will take a lot of pics when there is movement, so a few of the pics will be very clear, incase i need to use them for identication.

Reviews.Title: security camera?
Reviews.Author: Ronald Reuse
Reviews.Content: Camera is always on. One that comes on when needed would have been better. The batteries burn out quickly and when they do you lose the date and time stamp, so an a/c adapter seem essential.It has built in memory, but it doesn't keep the time stamp.Take out the batteries and you have to reset the time and date. The camera is white. It would be less visible if it was a dark color. I ended up returning the item because I couldn't use it in the way I wanted.

Reviews.Title: What a great item!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Mike
Reviews.Content: I don't know why so many people have bad reviews on this. I ordered several of these and they all work great!!!! I guess if u put the batteries in wrong they would burn up. So be careful and make sure they are in the right way. I really love these things they work great! The only thing bad to say is they do eat batteries, but there is an optioal a/c hookup on bottom. I give this product a a+++ !

Reviews.Title: Not worth the $$
Reviews.Author: Greg D
Reviews.Content: Pros: the photos looked good.Cons: The unit took many more photos with NO movement. Filled the internal memory in less than a day with no one walking into the room. The worst part was that the batteries (4 AA) did not last 3 weeks! Not worth it.

Reviews.Title: U.S. Patrol security camera
Reviews.Author: Royal ROY
Reviews.Content: Buyer Beware--This product and the distributor should be investigated for false advertising.  This product is a waste of money and does not perform as advertised.Since it is supplied by someone other than Amazon it is not returnable nor is it refundable. Think twice before buying this product as it is a sham. Save your money, this is an absolutely useless product that has no value.  Sign me as  "One born every minute"

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: zodiac
Reviews.Content: this thing is  COMPLETE WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY maybe mine was defective, but most of the pics that were taken only showed an elbow or a blurry image. in all i would not buy this again.

Reviews.Title: US Patrol issue
Reviews.Author: Ashmead M. Ali
Reviews.Content: This unit takes reasonable pictures but it will not allow me to set the date and time.If you need pics without a timeline it would be a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Slow response, drains batteries too quickly
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I installed one at the top of the stairs at my girlfriend's house - she's been broken into twice through the daylight basement, and I thought I could catch the faces of people coming up the stairs.  From the time my head sets off the motion detector until it takes a picture the only thing in the frame is my knees if I'm going slowly - it's been in for a couple weeks now and it hasn't caught a single picture of anyone, even though she has to walk directly through its path up and down the stairs to the laundry room.  The batteries are already dead and the last pictures it did catch (the cat sitting in front of it) the batteries were low enough the time stamp had reset to Jan 1 2008.It's a nice discreet unit, but with the slow reaction time it gives a false sense of security.

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: Pamela Schuyler
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and he has yet to put it to use. I hope when he does it will serve the purpose it was bought for.

Reviews.Title: Okay but description lies
Reviews.Author: Donald Henderson
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these and even though it says it will hold 200 pictures and has 16mb of internal memory, the truth is that it only has 8mb and holds 100-115 pictures. Even the instructions say 16mb but it is not true. You need pretty bright light to get clear pictures but it does work. As has been said, the motion detection is overly sensitive and it takes a minimum of 3 pictures when you just wave your hand in front of it.

Reviews.Title: Opened the box inserted batteries, didn't work
Reviews.Author: Thomas J Alcott
Reviews.Content: Opened the box inserted batteries, didn't work , specifically the mini-screen didn't illuminate. Attached USB and saw some pixels on the mini-screen. Seemed very fragile, thankfully Amazon refunded my order

Reviews.Title: cheap looking
Reviews.Author: Tri-City Properties
Reviews.Content: should have read the add more carefully.  Still photos only.  YOu get what you pay for.  Carfully consider the amount of money you are spending and what you expect to get for it.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: This thing will take pictures if a mouse farts but it hardly notices a human walking into the room. Spend real money and get a trail cam for hunting, not this thing a am ashamed of myself for this purchase

Reviews.Title: poor product
Reviews.Author: Mike James Pardue
Reviews.Content: Not very good at all was very unhappy with this item and would not recomend this to anyone was a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Hard to set date/time and not very sensitive.
Reviews.Author: Neen
Reviews.Content: Hard to set date/time and not very sensitive.It is also a pain to get the pictures out of it. With the sd card or with wire.

Reviews.Title: NO CUSTOMER SUPPORT ON CAMERA
Reviews.Author: OKIE
Reviews.Content: Photo's  are clear,  When I turn it on, it keeps taking photo's without any motion.  It will take about 100 photo's without stopping within 15 minutes. This could shoot over 1000 photo's a night. Tell me if I am missing something. I have no one to talk to not even Jabar about this,

Reviews.Title: Save your money.
Reviews.Author: M. D. Ledford
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money on this junk. Had I read some of the other reviews beforehand, I would have never bought it in the first place.It took grainy pictures... and already it takes NO pictures. Dead as a door nail.It ate batteries like mad. Installed new batteries and it's just been sitting idle for a couple of weeks. I tried it today and it won't even turn on.Tested the batteries which all checked out at 1.5+ volts. Reinstalled them (yes, correctly) and NOTHING. It's in the garbage. $32.50 wasted.My advice is to stay far away from this item. I only wish it would smoke and burn like in several of the other reviews I've read. At least that would provide a moment's entertainment. As is, nothing but landfill fodder.

Reviews.Title: not worth buying
Reviews.Author: M. Albino
Reviews.Content: I owned three of these, the other two stopped working, the first became very hot and failed to turn on after about three months of use. The second  one simply failed to turn on for some reason after about two months. The third one still works but I don't have plan to buy another one. I guess it will be just a matter of time for the third one to fail. I don't think the product was designed for long term use.

Reviews.Title: rip off junk burning trash
Reviews.Author: Staffordshire terriers Love "Rescue"
Reviews.Content: i installed new batteries correctly and the unit smoked stunk and burnt up! 45$ in the trash. shame on amazon and shame on made in china =/us patrol. straight up $45 dollar ripoff...

Reviews.Title: Good Idea Poor Product
Reviews.Author: D. Coleman
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to use in an empty rental property.  It is very difficult to set the time and date.  In the guide it says after you turn it on it will automatically start taking pictures in 3 minutes.  It does not do this every time and there is no indicator to tell you that it is working. When it does works the pictures are good, you just never know when it is actually taking them.  It is a good idea, but the product leaves a lot to be desired. I tossed mine in the trash.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: M. Bono
Reviews.Content: It takes pictures of nothing moving, shuts off whenever it wants and downloading the pictures and deleting the unit is almost imposible... way to slow.

Reviews.Title: Invest in batteries
Reviews.Author: Rodney G. Laramie "rodster"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to use at a cabin we built. The concept is great. However this unit goes through the batteries. We would leave for the weekend and the batteries would be dead half way through. I tried to contact the manufacturer about an a/c power adaptor and they didn't even bother to reply. Now it sets in it's box, in the closet. It's cheap because it it costs alot to operate. I am currently looking into motion activated video surveillance.

Reviews.Title: THIS PRODUCT IS THE WORST!
Reviews.Author: Richard J Kappler
Reviews.Content: I opened the box with great expectations.  I read the somewhat childish English instructions and put the device to work.  Guess what....it did nothing.  I even had two other people try it out in case I was doing something wrong.  The only thing wrong was buying this product.  I returned it for a full refund.  Save your money!  Buy a different product!

Reviews.Title: Home Security Plus
Reviews.Author: Harvey M. Edwards
Reviews.Content: I bought  a photo patrol a while back, I was a little leery about the performanceof the camera at first. Now I would be glad to recommend it to others.For best results, purchase a SD card.

Reviews.Title: seeing eye
Reviews.Author: William H Rukes
Reviews.Content: works fine gives some pease of mind in some cases by keeping a eye on things when one isn,t there !!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Keep watch day or night
This handy camera is a high-quality, full color security camera that helps you safe guard your home and business
It is designed to withstand the elements for years of trouble free use
Motion activated with an infrared sensor instantly captures sharp photos
Ideal for monitoring driveways-it will even get license plates
ProductInfo.Name: U.S. Patrol JB5472 Photo Patrol Security Camera
